projects.name: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack MERN e-commerce platform featuring product management, shopping cart, order processing, and Stripe payment gateway integration.

projects.name: Todo With Context
projects.description: A task management application built with React, utilizing Context API for efficient state management. Users can add, update, and delete tasks with a clean and responsive UI.

projects.name: Crypto Trading Simulator
projects.description: A real-time crypto trading simulation app with countdown timers, profit/loss logic, and balance updates using Binance API.

projects.name: Countries App
projects.description: A React application that displays detailed information about countries, including population, region, and flag, with search and filter functionality for better user experience.

projects.name: Hotel Booking
projects.description: A MERN-stack hotel booking platform that allows users to search hotels, view details, and make reservations with authentication and secure booking flow.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A weather forecast app that fetches live weather data from OpenWeather API and displays real-time conditions.

projects.name: Background Auto Changer
projects.description: A simple project that automatically changes the background color dynamically at intervals, creating engaging visual effects.

projects.name: Auto Text Animation
projects.description: A text animation project that displays auto typing and deleting effects, often used for banners and headers.

projects.name: Notes App
projects.description: A simple CRUD-based notes app with persistent storage and search functionality.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: A fully functional calculator app with advanced arithmetic and percentage operations.

projects.name: To-Do List
projects.description: A to-do list app with task categorization, local storage, and responsive design.

projects.name: Mini WikiPedia
projects.description: A mini Wikipedia search app that fetches real-time data using the Wikipedia API and displays article summaries dynamically.

projects.name: Auto Word Length
projects.description: A text utility tool that calculates the word and character length dynamically as the user types.

projects.name: Random Quote Generator
projects.description: An app that fetches and displays random inspirational quotes dynamically from an API at the click of a button.

projects.name: Animated Social Media Icons
projects.description: A CSS-based project featuring animated hover effects on social media icons to enhance UI interactivity.

projects.name: Digital Clock
projects.description: A live digital clock app displaying real-time hours, minutes, and seconds.

projects.name: React Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: A classic tic-tac-toe game built with React, featuring dynamic state management and win/draw detection.

projects.name: Css Image Hover
projects.description: A responsive image gallery with hover effects, modal preview, and animations.

projects.name: Currency Converter
projects.description: A currency converter app that fetches real-time exchange rates from an API and calculates conversions instantly.

projects.name: Interactive Card Flip
projects.description: A CSS and JavaScript-based 3D flip card effect for product and portfolio showcases.
